name: DeepThunderforSleep
0:
”Alexa open deep thunder”
”Alexa ask deep thunder to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: deep thunder
des: Boom! As the sky opens out with deep rumbles of thunder, you're able to quickly fall asleep in the safety of your own bed. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Deep Thunder,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
